#summary Dependencies

*Hibernate Core 3.2.x or 3.3.1*

  * For Hibernate Core 3.2.x: add *Log4j 1.2.14*
 
  * For Hibernate Core 3.3.1: add *Log4j 1.2.15* and *slf4j-log4j12-1.5.2.jar*


*Hibernate Annotations 3.4.0*


*Hibernate Validator 3.1.0*

  * For Hibernate Core 3.2.x: add *slf4j-log4j12.jar*


*Struts 2.0.9+ or 2.1.6*


*Commons collections 3.1+*


*Commons io 1.3.2+*


*Commons lang 2.3+*


Files *Log4j 1.2.14*, *Log4j 1.2.15*, *slf4j-log4j12-1.5.2.jar*, *commons-collections-3.1.jar*, *commons-io-1.3.2.jar* and *commons-lang-2.3.jar* can be downloaded *[http://full-hibernate-plugin-for-struts2.googlecode.com/files/struts2-fullhibernatecore-plugin-1.1-GA-Light-dependencies.zip here]*.
